text: Map of Massachusetts House of Representatives' 3rd Berkshire district, 2013. Based on 2010 United States Census. Massachusetts House of Representatives' 3rd Berkshire district in the United States is one of 160 legislative districts included in the lower house of the Massachusetts General Court. It covers part of Pittsfield in Berkshire County. Democrat Tricia Farley-Bouvier of Pittsfield has represented the district since 2011. The current district geographic boundary overlaps with that of the Massachusetts Senate's Berkshire, Hampshire, Franklin and Hampden district. ==Representatives== * Edward Larned, circa 1858 * Julius Rockwell, circa 1858 * Henry Colt, circa 1859 * John A. Walker, circa 1859 * Samuel M. Raymond, circa 1888 * Elmer L. McCulloch, circa 1920 * Thomas Edward Enright, circa 1951 * William Kitterman, circa 1975 * Robert Jakubowicz, circa 1990 * Peter J. Larkin, 1991–2005 * Christopher Speranzo, 2005–2011 * Tricia Farley-Bouvier, 2011-current ==Former locales== The district previously covered: * Dalton, circa 1872 * Richmond, circa 1872 ==See also== * Other Berkshire County districts of the Massachusetts House of Representatives: 1st, 2nd, 4th * List of Massachusetts House of Representatives elections * List of Massachusetts General Courts * List of former districts of the Massachusetts House of Representatives ==Images== 1908 David Cole Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|David Cole 1918 Cornelius Boothman Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Cornelius Boothman 1923 Elmer McCulloch Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Elmer McCulloch 1935 Harry Sisson Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Harry Sisson 1935 Ralph Otis Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Ralph Otis 1935 William Akeroyd Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|William Akeroyd 1945 Daniel Casey Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Daniel Casey 1945 Matthew Capeless Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Matthew Capeless 1953 Thomas Edward Enright Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Thomas Edward Enright 1967 William Kitterman Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|William Kitterman 1983 Robert Jakubowicz Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Robert Jakubowicz 1995 Peter Larkin Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Peter Larkin ==References== ==External links== * Ballotpedia * (State House district information based on U.S. Census Bureau's American Community Survey).
